page.title: 03HOME LIFE-A MOTHER'S DAY-
page.content: My mam got up at 7:45 got washed and dressed and opened the curtains and windows then made the bed. We all went down stairs and mam made breakfast. When we were having breakfast she was hanging out the washing then dusted the house.After seeing us off to school she washed up,had coffee and went to Stanley shopping. Then she did some ironing, had a bath and came to school to work as a dinnerlady.With the help of other helpers she put out the tables and forms, set the tables, served dinner and then cleaned away. She went home and made dinner for us, washed up,vacuumed the house,washed the clothes ready to hang out in the morning.After we went to bed she made dinner for my dad .She washed up and then went to bed at 11:45.
